JobFullDesc: About the RoleWhether it’s a sandwich, a burrito, or groceries, the Uber Eats team builds technology to connect people with what, when and where they want it. Our Strategy & Ops team empowers our regional and local teams through insights, analysis, and thought leadership. On the Uber Eats Regional Operations team, we’re helping to scale our most impactful processes and initiatives, support markets and drive innovation in the business.
